Title: 10.3.5 Include Origin of Events in Log Entries

Data:
==Applies To==

* PCI DSS Requirement 10.3.5

==Policy Statement==

Include origin of events in log entries.

==Policy Purpose==

Log entries should include important details so that the contents of the logs are useful for forensics and system administration.

==Related Guidance==

* [[ae5e20be-5f68-49e9-8700-a9e628fd8931|Log Important Event Details]]

==Related Checklist Items==

* [[75583580-87f5-4ae1-92bf-aae1eae3afd5|Important Event Details Are Logged]]
